aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a key that is present in the request the user makes to the Secrets Manager service

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the list of all the tag key names present in the request the user makes to the Secrets Manager service
